body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue ```console $ spack spec -I Input spec -------------------------------- font-util Concretized -------------------------------- pat57zn font-util@1.3.2%gcc@4.8.5 fonts=encodings,font-adobe-100dpi,font-adobe-75dpi,font-adobe-utopia-100dpi,font-adobe-utopia-75dpi,font-adobe-utopia-type1,font-alias,font-arabic-misc,font-bh-100dpi,font-bh-75dpi,font-bh-lucidatypewriter-100dpi,font-bh-lucidatypewriter-75dpi,font-bh-type1,font-bitstream-100dpi,font-bitstream-75dpi,font-bitstream-speedo,font-bitstream-type1,font-cronyx-cyrillic,font-cursor-misc,font-daewoo-misc,font-dec-misc,font-ibm-type1,font-isas-misc,font-jis-misc,font-micro-misc,font-misc-cyrillic,font-misc-ethiopic,font-misc-meltho,font-misc-misc,font-mutt-misc,font-schumacher-misc,font-screen-cyrillic,font-sun-misc,font-winitzki-cyrillic,font-xfree86-type1 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell ntcu2om ^readline@8.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell 22chhje ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@4.8.5~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-rhel7-haswell a66dqdw ^pkgconf@1.8.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell kn7p524 ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-haswell t5dgmt5 ^automake@1.16.5%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell qu26dkk ^bdftopcf@1.0.5%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell cv54jo5 ^fontsproto@2.1.3%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell 2m4dne2 ^util-macros@1.19.3%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell rwthmdp ^libxfont@1.5.2%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell tthpyd4 ^freetype@2.11.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell bf5tmfy ^libpng@1.6.37%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell wzjloit ^libfontenc@1.1.3%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell stbkzd3 ^xproto@7.0.31%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell tsbtgit ^xtrans@1.3.5%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell g75rogj ^mkfontdir@1.0.7%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell erzdewu ^mkfontscale@1.1.2%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-rhel7-haswell ``` ### Error message

### Information on your system * **Spack:** 0.17.1-948-ebedf3f * **Python:** 2.7.5 * **Platform:** linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512 * **Concretizer:** clingo ### Additional information * [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8131665/spack-build-out.txt) * [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8131664/spack-build-env.txt) ### General information - [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform - [X] I have run `spack maintainers ` and **@mentioned** any maintainers - [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files - [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: font-util (RHEL 7.4) - "failed to write cache"
